snippet: The Islamic State has released a Hollywood-style video to respond to President Obama’s declaration that he would “degrade and ultimately destroy” it.
abstract: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria issues response to Pres Obama's promise to degrade and ultimately destroy it; short video clip, billed as preview for longer one, pledges to kill American ground forces should they be deployed in region.
lead_paragraph: The Islamic State has released a Hollywood-style video to respond to President Obama’s declaration that he would “degrade and ultimately destroy” it.

headline.main: Islamic State Issues Video Challenge to Obama
headline.print_headline: Militants Issue Riposte on Video to Obama

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
